H0.text: Arthur Dent and Ford Prefect first appear in which book. The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy

H1.text: Arthur Dent and Ford Prefect first appear in which book. Dirk Gently's Holistic Detective Agency

H2.text: Arthur Dent and Ford Prefect first appear in which book. The Restaurant at the End of the Universe

H3.text: Arthur Dent and Ford Prefect first appear in which book. HG2G

A4.text: The first book was adapted from the first four radio episodes (the Primary Phase), with Arthur being rescued from Earth's destruction by Ford, meeting Zaphod and Trillian, coming to the planet of Magrathea and discovering the true purpose of Earth, and ending with the group preparing to go to the Restaurant at the End of the Universe.
